title: Geographic Confusion
description:
# Geographic Confusion

- **Iowa/South Dakota mixup:** Thanked supporters in **Sioux City, Iowa** for coming out to **Sioux Falls, South Dakota** [Source: Rally speech, 2023; The Mirror]
- **South America/South Africa:** Confused South America with South Africa, then doubled down saying South Africa shouldn't be in the G20 [Source: Axios, The Mirror, 2024]
summary:
- Iowa/South Dakota mixup: Thanked supporters in Sioux City, Iowa for coming out to Sioux Falls, South Dakota 
- South America/South Africa: Confused South America with South Africa, then doubled down saying South Africa shouldn't be in the G20
keyPoints: **Iowa/South Dakota mixup:** Thanked supporters in **Sioux City, Iowa** for coming out to **Sioux Falls, South Dakota** [Source: Rally speech, 2023; The Mirror]
**South America/South Africa:** Confused South America with South Africa, then doubled down saying South Africa shouldn't be in the G20 [Source: Axios, The Mirror, 2024]
